    • accepts

      public boolean accepts​(Person person, long time)
      Will this provider accept the given person as a patient at the given time?.
      Parameters:
      person - Person to consider
      time - Time the person seeks care
      Returns:
      whether or not the person can receive care by this provider

    • findService

      public static Provider findService​(Person person, HealthRecord.EncounterType service, long time)
      Find specific service provider for the given person.
      Parameters:
      person - The patient who requires the service.
      service - The service required. For example, EncounterType.AMBULATORY.
      time - The date/time within the simulated world, in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      Service provider or null if none is available.

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clear the list of loaded and cached providers.

    • loadProviders

      public static void loadProviders​(Location location, long clinicianSeed)
      Load into cache the list of providers for a state.
      Parameters:
      location - the state being loaded.

    • loadProviders

      public static void loadProviders​(Location location, java.lang.String filename, java.util.Set<HealthRecord.EncounterType> servicesProvided, long clinicianSeed) throws java.io.IOException
      Read the providers from the given resource file, only importing the ones for the given state. THIS method is for loading providers and generating clinicians with specific specialties
      Parameters:
      location - the state being loaded
      filename - Location of the file, relative to src/main/resources
      servicesProvided - Set of services provided by these facilities
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read

    • chooseClinicianList

      public Clinician chooseClinicianList​(java.lang.String specialty, RandomNumberGenerator rand)
      Randomly chooses a clinician out of a given clinician list.
      Parameters:
      specialty - - the specialty to choose from.
      rand - - random number generator.
      Returns:
      A clinician with the required specialty.
